Title: III.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (creator), Robert Levine (creator), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Robert Levine
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Flint and Gates seek a partner to hunt the Urca d'Lima. Silver helps Billy with a morale problem. Vane impresses Eleanor by being reasonable. Gates gets a promotion.
